title: Where the City Is Your Backyard-ENERGY CORRIDOR
posting_body: Our Deerpark floor plan has a great open floor plan to entertain your guest with a bar counter top and can visit with your guest weather they are in the living room, dining room or sitting out on the patio.

The Deerpark comes with crown molding, 9 ft. ceilings, ceramic entry, marble vanity counter tops, large walk in closet, stackable washer/dryer in apartment along with built in microwaves, ice maker refrigerators.
A large patio for sitting outside and enjoying the nature feel of living at The Lexington.
We are a pet-friendly community that doesn’t have any breed restrictions or weight limits.
Residents can also relax by the pool under the gazebo on those hot, stressful days.
The community has a clubhouse where residents can use the Wi-Fi or have a cup of Joe at the coffee bar.
Contact the leasing office today to schedule a private tour.
The other GREAT thing is that your rent of $1190 includes your Water, Sewer, Trash, & Pest Control...
*An Additional, refundable deposit amount may be requested per the results of your application screening*
